Attribute.name: expression
Attribute.description: An expression usually takes the form expression='({Room.test}=={Room.test})', see the wiki for detailed examples.

Attribute.name: value
Attribute.description: The value to switch on

Attribute.name: value
Attribute.description: The value is usually a string, the switch attempts to find one of its children nodes with the same name as the input value, if no child nodes match the input value the switch will look for a childe node called 'default'.

Attribute.name: gameObject
Attribute.description: The game object that fires the event we want to act on

Attribute.name: event
Attribute.description: The event name

Attribute.name: request_id
Attribute.description: Unique id

Attribute.name: title
Attribute.description: Title of the notification

Attribute.name: body
Attribute.description: Body of the notification

Attribute.name: request_type
Attribute.description: Type of notification

Attribute.name: read
Attribute.description: Whether the message has been read

Attribute.name: sender_avatar_id
Attribute.description: Avatar id of the sender

Attribute.name: sender_name
Attribute.description: Avatar name of the sender

Attribute.name: recipient_id
Attribute.description: Avatar id of the recipient

Attribute.name: recipient_name
Attribute.description: Avatar name of the recipient

Attribute.name: can_accept
Attribute.description: Whether the notification can be accepted

Attribute.name: can_reject
Attribute.description: Whether the notification can be rejected

Attribute.name: can_cancel
Attribute.description: Whether the notification can be cancelled

Attribute.name: can_remove
Attribute.description: Whether the notification can be removed (Use for client created notifications only)

Attribute.name: targetContainer
Attribute.description: Named MXML component used to display the growl

Attribute.name: notification
Attribute.description: The notification to display

Attribute.name: duration
Attribute.description: Number of milliseconds to display the growl for (-1 = forever)

Attribute.name: skin
Attribute.description: Growl skin

Attribute.description: The skin class

Attribute.name: targetContainer
Attribute.description: The skin container

Attribute.name: attachSkin
Attribute.description: True if the skin should be attached immediately

Attribute.name: namespace
Attribute.desciption: The namespace used by the room when communicating with the server

Attribute.description: The skin class

Attribute.name: targetContainer
Attribute.description: The skin container

Attribute.name: attachSkin
Attribute.description: True if the skin should be attached immediately

Attribute.name: gameObject
Attribute.description: The gameobject to remove from the world, for example gameObject='{Room.grog}'

Attribute.name: gameObject
Attribute.description: The gameobject to remove from the world, for example gameObject='{Room.grog}'

Attribute.name: roomName
Attribute.description: The target room name. The room name is the name of the GAML file without the .xml suffix, for example, to travel to the huts.xml room use roomName='huts'.

Attribute.name: useServer
Attribute.description: If set to false the client will change room without attempting to speak to the server

Attribute.description: The skin class

Attribute.description: The id of the shop to close

Attribute.name: product
Attribute.description: The product to purchase

Attribute.name: quantity
Attribute.description: The quantity of the product to purchase

Attribute.name: payment_type
Attribute.description: How to pay for the product

Attribute.description: The product to purchase

Attribute.name: quantity
Attribute.description: The quantity of the product to gift

Attribute.name: payment_type

Attribute.name: resetDelay
Attribute.description: The delay before resetting the active target game object

Attribute.name: customCursorClass
Attribute.description: The class used for the mouse cursor shown when rolling over a verbEnabled gameobject

Attribute.name: id
Attribute.description: The id of the verb, for example OnLookAt. This is the name used by the trigger to handle the event.

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.description: The name of the verb, for example 'Look at'. This is the name used by the gui.

Attribute.name: id
Attribute.description: All IDs must be unique

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.description: The name of the quest

Attribute.name: active
Attribute.description: Only active quests are visible in the quest interface

Attribute.name: complete
Attribute.description: Setting a quest to complete completes all objectives

Attribute.name: description
Attribute.description: The quest description

Attribute.name: id
Attribute.description: All IDs must be unique

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.description: The name of the objective

Attribute.name: active
Attribute.description: Only active objectives are visible in the quest interface

Attribute.name: complete
Attribute.description: Setting an objective to complete does not reveal the next objective, the GAML author is responsible for revealing the next objective

Attribute.name: description
Attribute.description: The description of the item shown in the inventory

Attribute.name: previewURL
Attribute.description: Path to the thumbnail shown in the inventory

Attribute.name: quantity
Attribute.description: The quantity in the backpack

Attribute.description: A possession

Attribute.description: A condition that must be passed for the combination to take place.

Attribute.name: gameObject
Attribute.description: The game object the speech bubble will appear above

Attribute.name: message
Attribute.description: The message to show in the chat bubble

Attribute.name: fitToScreen
Attribute.description: If true the bubble will not slide off the edge of visible area

Attribute.name: moveTail
Attribute.description: If the bubble is fitted to screen this attribute will move the bubble tail to follow the player

Attribute.name: screenBuffer
Attribute.description: How far the bubble should stop from the edge of the screen

Attribute.name: maxWidth
Attribute.description: The max width for the text field. If the text is wider the bubble will span multile lines

Attribute.name: useServer
Attribute.description: Whether to broadcast this message to other users in the room

Attribute.name: gameObject
Attribute.description: The game object to move

Attribute.name: x
Attribute.description: The x location of the game object. If none is specified the x attritubte of the game object will be used

Attribute.name: x
Attribute.description: The y location of the game object. If none is specified the y attritubte of the game object will be used

Attribute.name: end_x
Attribute.description: The end x location of the game object

Attribute.name: end_y
Attribute.description: The end y location of the game object

Attribute.name: useServer
Attribute.description: Whether the game server should be notified of the move event

Attribute.name: id
Attribute.description: The id value must be unique

Attribute.name: width
Attribute.description: The width of the collision area is usually the same as the walkable area.

Attribute.name: height
Attribute.description: The height of the collision area is usually the same as the walkable area.

Attribute.name: solid
Attribute.description: If the solid attribute is set to true the player will not be able to walk through the collision area.

Attribute.name: id
Attribute.description: The id value must be unique

Attribute.name: id
Attribute.description: The id value must be unique

Attribute.name: url
Attribute.description: The path to the asset

Attribute.name: assetID
Attribute.description: The id of an Asset node that defines the collision area

Attribute.description: The skin class

Attribute.name: targetContainer
Attribute.description: The skin container

Attribute.name: attachSkin
Attribute.description: True if the skin should be attached immediately

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.description: The human readable name to be shown in the map interface

Attribute.name: id
Attribute.description: The id of the location must be unique

Attribute.name: roomID
Attribute.description: The roomID is the name of the target rooms GAML file without the .xml suffix, e.g. for the room described in Huts.xml the roomID attribute is 'huts'.

Attribute.name: locationID
Attribute.description: The location to update

Attribute.name: visible
Attribute.description: Set the location to visible so it shows in the interface

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.description: The name of the target attribute

Attribute.name: value
Attribute.description: The new value

Attribute.name: target
Attribute.description: The target gameobject that the new value will be set on. This is not a direct path to the attribtue. For example, the target='{Room.npc}' and the name='x' and the value='100' would set the x attribute of the npc to 100.

Attribute.name: target
Attribute.description: The target gameobject that the new value will be set on. This is not a direct path to the attribtue. Any other attributes definited in the behaviour will be set upon the specified game object.

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.description: The name of the target attribute

Attribute.name: value
Attribute.description: The new value

Attribute.name: target
Attribute.description: The target gameobject that the new value will be set on. This is not a direct path to the attribute. For example, the target='{Room.npc}' and the name='x' and the value='100' would set the x attribute of the npc to 100.

Attribute.name: message
Attribute.description: The text to write out to the debugger

Attribute.name: message
Attribute.description: The message to be shown in the alert

Attribute.name: title
Attribute.description: The title of the alert window
